body:
Minarchism was never fully achieved though. Some of the founding fathers wanted it but the tribalistic masses naturally supported the federalists and more authoritarian ideas, so those are the ones that won out in the end. There was a period in the 1800s where it was sought out en masse but a return to big government was easy since the laws were never further restricted, just went unenforced for a time.

But I don't see why ancapistan can't stand, the US military already functions more or less on its own without need for a draft. The reason its difficult is because the hierarchical and tribalistic primal instincts of humans are opposed to it and few will be on board.
body_html:
Minarchism was never fully achieved though. Some of the founding fathers wanted it but the tribalistic masses naturally supported the federalists and more authoritarian ideas, so those are the ones that won out in the end. There was a period in the 1800s where it was sought out en masse but a return to big government was easy since the laws were never further restricted, just went unenforced for a time.

But I don't see why ancapistan can't stand, the US military already functions more or less on its own without need for a draft. The reason its difficult is because the hierarchical and tribalistic primal instincts of humans are opposed to it and few will be on board.

parent.body:
>It's because the organized can and will squash the disorganized

This is the only reason ancap doesn't last. In a vacuum, it's just fine. In reality, there needs to be a core government to keep things held together and to be able to quickly raise an army. Private armies can, and will, sell to the highest bidder. 
And that's why minarchism smashes on ancap. Minarchism was the basis of the most powerful empire in human history (ours), so it has a bit of a proven record.
parent.body_html:
It's because the organized can and will squash the disorganized

This is the only reason ancap doesn't last. In a vacuum, it's just fine. In reality, there needs to be a core government to keep things held together and to be able to quickly raise an army. Private armies can, and will, sell to the highest bidder. And that's why minarchism smashes on ancap. Minarchism was the basis of the most powerful empire in human history (ours), so it has a bit of a proven record.

body:
I don't hate men like you think, I'm complaining because that's just the reality of life and it's not at all fair. All of nature, both male and female, revolves around the female, because that is the natural order of reproduction. She has what's valuable, the vagina, while the male possesses the incredibly expendable semen and is easily replaced. What does this mean? That the female is inherently valuable just for existing, while the male's only worth is in what he does. And biology reflects that. Female brains are designed for logic and creativity, whereas male brains are optimized for boring motor skills. Female brains are designed to enhance joyful and comforting emotions, whereas male brains are designed to feel rage to make them more aggressive. People are hardwired to have an abundance of sympathy for women but not care about men any special amount. What a man will get the death penalty for a woman will get 5 years or even off. When a woman is bullied or hurt people rush to support, when it's a man people laugh. When a woman bullies someone she gets praised, when a man does it he's scum. A woman is not expected to earn as high grades or waste her whole life busting her butt at a job, she can always just leech off of men. Women have a higher tolerance for pain even though males have to endure brutal situations more often. Mens' needs are always the last priority, especially visible in a crisis. Men are expected to sign up for the draft. Women are even designed to look better than men. Basically men exist to spend their lives laboring away and their life doesn't matter. Is that fair? Do I say this because I hate men? On the contrary, I complain about this precisely because I don't hate men, otherwise I'd be proud of this reality.

> Well cool you aren't Jewish, then stop worshiping Israel and posting in Hebrew and people won't think you are.

I don't worship Israel, but I'm not going to stop posting in Hebrew because it's fun.

Female brains are designed for logic and creativity, whereas male brains are optimized for boring motor skills. Female brains are designed to enhance joyful and comforting emotions, whereas male brains are designed to feel rage to make them more aggressive. People are hardwired to have an abundance of sympathy for women but not care about men any special amount. What a man will get the death penalty for a woman will get 5 years or even off. When a woman is bullied or hurt people rush to support, when it's a man people laugh. When a woman bullies someone she gets praised, when a man does it he's scum. A woman is not expected to earn as high grades or waste her whole life busting her butt at a job, she can always just leech off of men. Women have a higher tolerance for pain even though males have to endure brutal situations more often. Mens' needs are always the last priority, especially visible in a crisis. Men are expected to sign up for the draft. Women are even designed to look better than men. Basically men exist to spend their lives laboring away and their life doesn't matter. Is that fair? Do I say this because I hate men? On the contrary, I complain about this precisely because I don't hate men, otherwise I'd be proud of this reality.

Well cool you aren't Jewish, then stop worshiping Israel and posting in Hebrew and people won't think you are.

Even some family and friends will legit disown you for holding views they don't agree with, especially if it's an area of feud between progressives vs conservatives, and even if they don't they'll see you as tainted and not trust you ever again. body_html: Government too needs consent of the governed, it's not any different. Unfortunately humans are naturally tribalistic and hierarchical, so they will almost always opt for government (even on ruqqus, after we just left reddit, most people are already white knighting the admins and discord mods as if they are divine beings and can do no wrong). Because of that ancapistan is extremely unlikely to ever exist, but it's not any less viable.

parent.body: Anarcho anything is just anarchy. Private is better than public, except for when it isn't. There's a reason you don't see large swaths of land that have no government when you look at a map of the world. It's because the organized can and will squash the disorganized. Government is a more viable strategy
parent.body_html: Anarcho anything is just anarchy. Private is better than public, except for when it isn't. There's a reason you don't see large swaths of land that have no government when you look at a map of the world. It's because the organized can and will squash the disorganized. Government is a more viable strategy

body: Why not? It allows for as much autonomy as possible while also creating a private framework of defending your rights. Private is often better than public, as government monopolies wield absolute power with no competition, and do not have to worry about being held accountable or satisfying their customers.
